aspell.command:
cd $SOURCE_DIR
TARBALL=$(ls aspell*.tar.bz2)
DIRECTORY=$(tar tf $TARBALL | cut -d/ -f1 | uniq)

tar xf $TARBALL
cd $DIRECTORY

gnome-shell-extensions.command: mkdir build && cd build && meson -Dextension_set=all --prefix=/usr .. && ninja

grilo.command:
mkdir build &&
cd    build    &&

meson --prefix=/usr \
      --libexecdir=/usr/lib \
-Denable-gtk-doc=false .. &&
ninja

libgdata.command:
mkdir build &&
cd    build    &&

meson --prefix=/usr -Dgtk_doc=false .. &&
ninja

rust.command:
cat > /tmp/clearcargo.sh <<EOF
if [ -d $HOME/.cargo ]; then
	rm -rf $HOME/.cargo
fi
EOF
chmod a+x /tmp/clearcargo.sh
/tmp/clearcargo.sh
sed -i "s@$HOME@/root@g" /tmp/clearcargo.sh
sudo /tmp/clearcargo.sh
sudo rm -f /tmp/clearcargo.sh
